title: smoothie
author: smoothie
content: Donation Auction #2 For Cold Key VictimsLOT 1ONE 1/2 oz 999 fine silver 2013 Litecoin 10 LTC (BUYER FUNDED holo marked, no key, or blank)  (Donated by Smoothie)* Note - shipping on this item will be a bit delayed given all donation items have yet to be shipped to minerjones after all 4 donation auctions are completed. Keep this delay in mind when bidding.**Note 2 - whomever wins has a choice of having this coin blank/no holo/no key, or with holo/key marked buyer funded. Coin comes with no Digital valueLOT 2ONE Alpen Coin roll 25x christmas edition ceramic chip unloaded. (no holo) (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)LOT 3ONE BTC metal plate (out of only 16 made) (Donated by Kryptowerk)LOT 4ONE 2017 South African Krugerrand 1 Troy Oz .999 Silver Coin (Donated by DaveF)LOT 5ONE of 21 San Fran Clear window polymerbit note (Donated by polymerbit)LOT 6ONE Silver Dragons Silverback 2022 AND the purchase price a of new Trezor or Ledger (shipping included) (Donated by minerjones)LOT 7ONE 1/2 oz silver Mary Ola BF bitcoin piece (Donated by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES)LOT 8ONE 1HodlClub Litecoin Casino Card and ONE 2021 IHodlClub Copper Bitcoin (Donated by Steeley)LOT 9ONE 2017 .999 Silver, not plated, Cryptonic Monero coin (Donated by 2stout)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________1) ONE 1/2 oz 999 fine silver 2013 Litecoin 10 LTC (BUYER FUNDED holo marked, no key, or blank)  (Donated by Smoothie) - stock photo of coin type used. Photo is not of the actual coin for auction. 2) ONE Alpen Coin roll 25x christmas edition ceramic chip unloaded. (no holo) (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)3) ONE BTC metal plate (out of only 16 made) (Donated by Kryptowerk)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________4) ONE 2017 South African Krugerrand 1 Troy Oz .999 Silver Coin (Donated by DaveF)5) ONE of 21 San Fran Clear window polymerbit note (Donated by polymerbit)6) ONE Silver Dragons Silverback 2022 AND the purchase price a of new Trezor or Ledger (shipping included) (Donated by minerjones)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________7) ONE 1/2 oz silver Mary Ola BF bitcoin piece (Donated by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES) ONE 1HodlClub Litecoin Casino Card and ONE 2021 IHodlClub Copper Bitcoin (Donated by Steeley)9) ONE 2017 .999 Silver, not plated, Cryptonic Monero coin (Donated by 2stout)Starting Bid for all lots: 0.00 BTCMinimum Bid increment for all lots is 0.0001END TIME:  February 21st, 2023  6:00PM ESTPayment is due within 24 hours of auction ending.SNIPING: Any bid made in the last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction an additional 5 minutes PER LOT.If no new bid is made within the 5 minute extension the auction will end, if a bid does come within that 5 minute period, the auction extends 5 minutes from the time that last bid was made.PAYMENT: Bitcoin See PGP bitcoin address from MinerJones belowShipping is based on location and preference. Please contact minerjones if you win an auction lot.Regarding payment confirmation please also contact MJ.-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA512February 1 2023 minerjones using address bc1qw5v9xtsasvrecnypx95gmew6ptzzy3fprr7gy9 to accept proceeds from the Coldkey victim auctions-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----Version: Keybase OpenPGP v2.1.13Comment: https://keybase.-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
